name: SoccerHub
introduce: SoccerHub is a play-to-earn multi-player game, which is a combination of traditional soccer manager games and trending NFT games. Soccerhub is built with the aim to create fun activities and campaigns surrounding the in-game characters for soccer fans. The team also concentrates on the importance of creating one-of-a-kind NFT soccer players with distinct genes and skills that provide economic opportunities for users.
